title: type holocaust
content:
hi guys,

i m a student from SCAD and i m doing a project that require to create a new type. the hard part is that the inspiration has to come from the cemetry. i started from doing a "rubbing" on the engraved text of one the tomb stone and the process continue on...

Cheers,  
Ray.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425021545im_/http:/typophile.com/files/holocaust_5679.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [holocaust.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425021545/http:/typophile.com/files/holocaust_0.jpg) | 299.16 KB |
author: api

comments.content: good start...it seems like youve reach the extremum of abstraction. Now try to tone it down and gets some legibility going. Also I find it easier to do hamburgefonstiv rather than working on all at once. Once I get a unified system for the "ham.." the rest will feel as a cohesive family.

hi there, the holocaust is a preface type and is not ment for body copy.in terms of legibility, i m not too worried about it as the holocaust is an abstraction type. but i appreciate your comments though.  
tks and cheers.  
Ray.
